sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; class RecentlyAddedTenders extends Component { state = {}; renderTenderTable = () => { let srNo = 0; let styleOfBadge; this.props.tenderList.map((tender) => { srNo++; if ((tender.status = "paid")) styleOfBadge = "success"; if ((tender.status = "cancelled")) styleOfBadge = "danger"; if ((tender.status = "awarded")) styleOfBadge = "primary"; return ( {`#000${srNo}`} #T686868 {tender.budgetAmount} 10-07-2020 {tender.deliveryDate} {tender.closingDate} {tender.status} ); }); }; render() { return (

Recently Added Tenders

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

Sr no Tender I'd Tender Amount Date of Creation Date of Delivery Tender Closing Date Status
#0001 #T686868 5000.00 USD 10-07-2020 20-09-2020 30-09-2020 Awarded
#0003 #T686868 5000.00 USD 10-07-2020 20-09-2020 30-09-2020 In Process
#0004 #T686868 5000.00 USD 10-07-2020 20-09-2020 30-09-2020 Cancelled
); } } export default RecentlyAddedTenders;
